Posts.Title: How Many Are We? zarovka SimonH

Posts.Content: adc21791 wrote: I am fairly new to this group. I am currently on TCH every 3 weeks. I have not read anything positive about Lung mets. I could use some positive input. I have stage IV HER2+ breast cancer with mets to the right lung and possible other areas. I will be having a PET SCAN 9/13/2016. Kim Dx 8/31/2007, DCIS, Left, Stage 0 Radiation Therapy 11/23/2007 Whole-breast: Breast Dx 5/20/2016, IDC, Right, 3cm, Stage IV, metastasized to lungs, Grade 3, HER2+ (IHC) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone else HER2+ with Lung mets adc21791 Fitztwins

Posts.Content: Aug 31, 2016 12:44PM - edited Sep 1, 2016 01:17PM by adc21791 Thank you dawny. I just found out in May 2016. I am still in that fear stage and mind going crazy with me. I am glad to hear your story. It gives me hope.
